text: 21:28 Esekiel 44:7; Aposel 6:13“Israelɨn gumaziba, ia en akuragh! Gumazir kam, en gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghasa, gumazir igharaziba ko nguibar igharaziba bar men sure gami. Egha Moses Osirizir Araziba ko Godɨn Dɨpenim gasɨghasɨgha mɨgei. A uaghan Grighɨn gumaziba inigha Godɨn Dɨpenim avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn aven ghua, God ua bagha inabazir Dɨpenim gamima a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze.”
